<title level="1" right="Cantrip 3" pfs="Standard">
[Shatter Mind](/Spells.aspx?ID=1140)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Psychic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=430" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 21

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 15-foot cone

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** 
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Will

</row>

</column>

---

You telepathically assail the minds of your foes. You deal 3d4 mental damage to all enemies in the area, with a basic Will save.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1d4.

---

<column gap="tiny">
**Amp** You increase the area of the spell to your choice of a 30-foot cone or 60-foot cone, and the damage dice for the spell change to d10s. Creatures that fail are [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) until the start of your next turn (or stupefied 2 on a critical failure).

</column>
name: Shatter Mind
